Articles.Content:
Hello. I was wondering if there is a mod somewhere that allows you to edit and rearrange the stock toolbar? For example, delete the stock rescources button and move the Alternate Rescource Panel one up there? I have tried blizzy's toolbar but I do not like the style and many mods don't use it. Thanks,

Benji13.

As a note: ARP can delete the stock resources button and replace it on it's own.  I find that it usually only works on the second craft I load per session (that is: I need to switch scenes, not go back to the tracking center), but it is an option.

4 hours ago, DStaal said:

As a note: ARP can delete the stock resources button and replace it on it's own.  I find that it usually only works on the second craft I load per session (that is: I need to switch scenes, not go back to the tracking center), but it is an option.

Ok. I tried that setting and every time I tried it just added a new button at the bottom of the toolbar. I didn't try a new craft though.

Note that it's not so much about craft - it's about leaving the scene and going to a new one.  You can EVA, and switch between local craft all you like without triggering the redraw which fixes it.  I haven't tried a F5/F9 cycle - that should fix it.
